channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hegseth responds to report that boat survivors were killed on his orders
item.description: According to The Washington Post, the boat strike initially left two survivors. A second strike was reportedly ordered to comply with Hegseth's direct...

item.title: 7/28/2024: Quantum Computing; Knife; College of Magic
item.description: First, a look inside the quantum computer race. Then, Salman Rushdie: The 2024 60 Minutes Interview. And, going inside the College of Magic.

item.title: Trump officials and judge face off over flights to El Salvador in rare, high-stakes contempt probe

item.description: President Trump calls for a major immigration overhaul; Airlines scramble to update software problem.

item.title: Investigators probe suspect's background in D.C. National Guard shooting
item.description: A National Guard member died in the wake of the shooting near the White House, President Trump said.

item.title: Airbus software issue may cause flight delays during busy Thanksgiving weekend

item.title: WATCH: Military funeral in Kyiv for American volunteer fighter
item.description: ABC News’ Ian Pannell is in Kyiv, Ukraine, at the funeral of an American who lost his life fighting against Russia’s invasion.

item.title: Winter storm warnings stretch across the northern US, bringing snow, cold and risky conditions
Shark attack in Australia leaves 1 dead, 1 injured
item.description: A woman has died, and a man was seriously injured after a shark attack off Australia’s east coast, police said Friday.
